tool_description: Access Tennis scores, player stats,  player profiles, tournament and more with our all-in-one API
name: Tennis API
title: Tennis API

api_list.name: Get Player Photos
api_list.description:
This enpoint will return all the photos of a given player on ESPN.

Parameters:
playerId (The player Id) Example: '740'
page (Default: 1)15 results per page

api_list.name: Get Player Videos
api_list.description:
This enpoint will return all the available videos on ESPN for a given player.

Parameters:
playerId. Example: '740'

api_list.name: Get Available Leagues
api_list.description: This endpoint will return the available leagues
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tennis-api.p.rapidapi.com/available-leagues"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tennis-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://tennis-api.p.rapidapi.com/available-leagues"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tennis-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get News
api_list.description:
Get News about Tennis.

Parameters:
limit (Default: 15)

api_list.name: Get Player Result
api_list.description:
This endpoint return the player result in a given year.

Parameters:

playerId (The id of the player. Example: '3782').
 year (YYYY) Default: '2024'

api_list.name: Get Scoreboard
Get Schedule
api_list.description:
This endpoint gets  the Schedule.

Parameters:
year (YYYY)
type (Default: 'atp' . Accepted Values: 'atp' | 'wta' )

api_list.name: Get Rankings
api_list.description:
This endpoint will return the ranking list.

Parameters:
year (YYYY)
type (Default: 'atp', accepted values: 'atp' | 'wta')

api_list.name: Get Player Profile
api_list.description:
This endpoint will return all relevant data about the player, such as birth date, birth place, current tournament, news and more.


Parameters:
 playerId (The Id of the player). example: 3782
